name: The Distracted Spy (Ink Version)
description:
You are Luke Stone. You are a MI6 agent. You have been appointed for a mission to catch a cyber-terrorist and you have  the choice to bring another agent with you: Lauren, an experienced field agent or Ben, an Research & Development worker who specialises in making gadgets and providing intel for missions. 

As you go through the mission, you will find out secrets that could potentially change everything you know about MI6. You will also get to know the agent you have chosen as a partner more and can get into a romance with them.  This romance may go successfully or unsuccessfully  depending on the choices you make.

Right now, I have completed 2 chapters of the game.
